query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `medical_conditions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `patient_id` int NOT NULL,
  `condition_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `condition_type` enum('chronic_disease','allergy','contraindication','risk_factor','past_condition') NOT NULL,
  `severity` enum('mild','moderate','severe') DEFAULT 'moderate',
  `status` enum('active','resolved','managed') DEFAULT 'active',
  `diagnosed_date` timestamp,
  `resolved_date` timestamp,
  `notes` text,
  `affects_medications` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `icd_code` varchar(20),
  `diagnosed_by` varchar(255),
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT (now()),
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `medical_conditions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)

  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `patient_id` int NOT NULL,
  `condition_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `condition_type` enum('chronic_disease','allergy','contraindication','risk_factor','past_condition') NOT NULL,
  `severity` enum('mild','moderate','severe') DEFAULT 'moderate',

  `diagnosed_date` timestamp,
  `resolved_date` timestamp,
  `notes` text,
  `affects_medications` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `icd_code` varchar(20),
  `diagnosed_by` varchar(255),
  `created_at` timestamp DEFAULT (now()),
  `updated_at` timestamp DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `medical_conditions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
)
